description:
Via Ferrata Della Memoria is a great via ferrata inbetween the towns of Codissago and Enzo, and a good choice of something to do if Zemola is flowing too high. At first it might seemed like it is going to be dull and uninspiring but after the first ladder, the real heat starts to kick in. It has a nice mix of exposure and vertical terror interspersed with comfy little ledges and great views of the river below and the dam.

Be sure to bring a headlamp for each person because the start goes through old tunnels.

Approach

Google Maps has the point marked as "Ingresso FERRATA della Memoria - Vajont"; you can navigate to this point which is at a switchback in the road. At this point there is a side road going off to the south; take this for a few hundred yards to the parking area.

Descent

Exit

After the end of the via ferrata, you will reach a junction on the trail that will have a sign for the dam going to the right. This is not the way back to the car -- go left, climbing up the hillside for 10 mins or so. Then you will find another junction with signs pointing back down to the town of Codissago. Follow these down the hillside back to your car.

Red tape

Beta sites

https://www.vieferrate.it/pag-relazioni/trentino-alto-adige/117-tessa/396-vajont.html

Trip reports and media

Background
